    Aracnia ented and followed Kitkat. She pointed for her companions to go 
and wait in another section of the ship. Taking a seat she said, "Kitkat, 
anything I should know?"

    Hell Beast was at the entrance to the bridge. It was ealed. And it was a 
dead end....he was trapped. "Damn it! Megatron, where are you?!!"
